mapper.insert: insert into TBDIMENSION (FDUDIMENSIONID, FDCDIMENSIONNAME, FDIDIMENSIONTYPE, FDULINKID, FDUCUBEID, FDURELATIONID, FDIAUTOOPTIMIZED, FDICODELENGTH, FDCDATEFORMAT, FDCDESC, FDIHIERARCHYCOUNT ) values (#{ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{linkID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cubeID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{relationID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{autoOptimized,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{codeLength,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{dateFormat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{desc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hierarchyCount,jdbcType=DECIMAL} )
mapper.update: update TBDIMENSION set FDCDIMENSIONNAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FDIDIMENSIONTYPE = #{type,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FDULINKID = #{linkID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FDUCUBEID = #{cubeID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FDURELATIONID = #{relationID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FDIAUTOOPTIMIZED = #{autoOptimized,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FDICODELENGTH = #{codeLength,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FDCDATEFORMAT = #{dateFormat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FDCDESC = #{desc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FDIHIERARCHYCOUNT = #{hierarchyCount,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where FDUDIMENSIONID = #{ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select FDUDIMENSIONID, FDCDIMENSIONNAME, FDIDIMENSIONTYPE, FDULINKID, FDUCUBEID, FDURELATIONID, FDIAUTOOPTIMIZED, FDICODELENGTH, FDCDATEFORMAT, FDCDESC, FDIHIERARCHYCOUNT from TBDIMENSION where FDUDIMENSIONID = #{ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select FDUDIMENSIONID, FDCDIMENSIONNAME, FDIDIMENSIONTYPE, FDULINKID, FDUCUBEID, FDURELATIONID, FDIAUTOOPTIMIZED, FDICODELENGTH, FDCDATEFORMAT, FDCDESC, FDIHIERARCHYCOUNT from TBDIMENSION

select FDUDIMENSIONID, FDCDIMENSIONNAME, FDIDIMENSIONTYPE, FDULINKID, FDUCUBEID, FDURELATIONID, FDIAUTOOPTIMIZED, FDICODELENGTH, FDCDATEFORMAT, FDCDESC, FDIHIERARCHYCOUNT from TBDIMENSION where FDUCUBEID = #{cubeID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
